keyFacts: The invoice is dated September 12, 2005, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to USD 192.39.
The invoice details multiple shipments sent by Epstein, including recipients Dmitri Simanav, Jeanne Brennan, and Koren Golden.
Packages were picked up on September 1, 2005, and delivered to various recipients shortly thereafter.
There are mentions of discounts applied to the shipping charges.
